evals.name: scan-single-competitor
evals.prompt: Scan Notion.com for their GEO strategy. I want to understand what they're doing for AI search.
evals.expected_output: GEO scan report with technical signals (llms.txt, schema), content structure, entity signals, and citation-optimized content analysis with scores.

evals.name: compare-competitors
evals.prompt: Compare our GEO setup to our competitors. We're Example.com, competitors are CompetitorA.com and CompetitorB.com.
evals.expected_output: Competitive matrix comparing all three domains across technical, content, entity, and citation dimensions with gap analysis.

evals.name: identify-quick-wins
evals.prompt: Scan our top 3 competitors and tell us what quick GEO wins we should implement.
evals.expected_output: Scan results with prioritized list of easy-to-implement improvements based on competitor analysis.
